text: (nabiyē!) “ohu allāh kerehi boruva manakkalpita kara pavasannēya” yayi ovun (oba gæna) pavasannehuda? (esē nam apagē mema dharmaya ovunṭa oba kiyavā penvīmaṭa nohæki andamaṭa) allāh adahas kaḷē nam, obagē hṛdaya mata mudrā tabannaṭa iḍa tibuṇi. (ebævin ovungē mema kiyamana sampūrṇayenma væradi ekak vannēya). allāh nam, boruva vināśa kara, tamangē vadana maginma satyaya sthīra karanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya. niyata vaśayenma ohu hṛdayanhi (rahasin tabāgena) æti dæyada hon̆din danneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
